|brand = ASUS |model = WL-700gE |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 8, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Asus_WL-700gE |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQWL700GE |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4780P;BCM4780PKPBG, CT0540 P11, 755626 M5; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS3300 |cpu1spd = 266 <!-- 300 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV160CTTC-90G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H561638F-UCCC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:17:31 |oui = 00:17:31
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, IDE |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_ide_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = Yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J5 |jtag = No
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = USB 2.0 Controller;VIA;VT6212L;VIA, VT6212L(C), 0532CD TAIWAN, 23B7009500 (C) (M);1; ,,, IDE controller;ACARD;ATP865-B;ACARD, ATP865-B, MACF55200-2 LF, (C)ACARD 2005, 0552 TAIWAN;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318E;BCM4318EKFBG, HS0609 P20, 772844 N1; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 9 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== '''MSQWL700GE''' would not seem to be a valid FCC ID.
The default SSID may be '''WL700gE-''' followed by 4 upper or lower-case letters. :There is a '''VIA''' VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board. There is also a '''ACARD''' ATP865-B on board for the 3.5" IDE interface.
==Links of Interest== :[http://web.archive.org/web/20120906061147/http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/WL700gE Product page (via archive.org)] {{â€¢}} [http://support.asus.com/download.aspx?SLanguage=en&m=WL-700gE&os=17 Support page]
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/asus/wl700ge On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.sukkamehulinko.romikselle.com/wl700g/ Internal shots] ([http://web.archive.org/web/20090402002256/http://www.sukkamehulinko.romikselle.com/wl700g/ via archive.org]) :"WL-700GE_R1.14" and the '''ASUS''' logo is silkscreened on the board shown.

Please insert instructions here
